meanings.sent1: I preship the packages before sending them out.
meanings.sent2: We preship all orders to ensure they arrive safely.
meanings.sent3: The team decided to preship the goods with extra care.
meanings.sent4: She preships the products like a skilled captain preparing a ship for a long voyage.
meanings.sent5: Remember to preship the fragile items to avoid any damage during transit.

meanings.definition: The act of preparing for shipment.
meanings.sent1: The preship of the goods is crucial for timely delivery.
meanings.sent2: We handle preship with utmost attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The preship process can be quite efficient when done correctly.
meanings.sent4: The preship of the items resembled a well-orchestrated dance.
meanings.sent5: Proper preship ensures smooth logistics and customer satisfaction.
